ingredients: 1 oz (4 medium) dried guajillo chiles, stemmed, seeded, and torn into several pieces
1/2 of a 15-oz can fire-roasted tomatoes, drained
2 garlic cloves, peeled and cut in half
1 large (about 1 lb) fennel bulb, stalks and fronds attached
3 T masa harina (or a generous 2 T fresh masa)
4 medium (about 3/4 lb total) portobello mushroom caps (you can use a spoon to scrape out the dark gills if you want, but I don’t mind them)
2 large russet potatoes, cut lengthwise into 1/4" slices
